2023_DAIE_ICA_1_FM: Part A

Quarto

# gives us ggplot2, dplyr, readr, tibble etc
if(!require("tidyverse"))
  install.packages("tidyverse")
Loading required package: tidyverse

library(tidyverse)

# interactive plots
if(!require("plotly"))
  #install.packages("plotly")
  install.packages("plotly", repos = "http://cran.rstudio.com/", dependencies=TRUE)
Loading required package: plotly

library(plotly)

# support for color blind users - see scale_color_colorblind() below
if(!require("ggthemes"))
  install.packages("ggthemes")
Loading required package: ggthemes
library(ggthemes)

# allows paginated tables
if(!require("DT"))
  install.packages("DT")
Loading required package: DT
library(DT)

#data manipulation
if(!require("dplyr"))
  install.packages("dplyr")
library(dplyr)

#allows to connect to database
if(!require("DBI"))
  install.packages("DBI")
Loading required package: DBI
library(DBI)

if(!require("RSQLite"))
  install.packages("RSQLite")
Loading required package: RSQLite
library(RSQLite)

Connect to Database

conn <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "ICA_2023.sqlite")

Total Budget for Projects in each Country

budPerProj <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT CustomerCountry, SUM(Budget), COUNT(CustomerCountry) FROM Projects JOIN Customers ON Projects.CustomerID=Customers.CustomerID GROUP BY CustomerCountry ORDER BY SUM(Budget) DESC")
knitr::kable(budPerProj)
CustomerCountry SUM(Budget) COUNT(CustomerCountry)
Spain 650000 2
UK 550000 2
Netherlands 400000 1
Italy 250000 1
France 200000 1
Germany 150000 1

Average Development Time per Project by Assests Used

avgTimePerProj <- dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * FROM Projects JOIN Assets ON Projects.ProjectID=Assets.ProjectID GROUP BY AssetName")
knitr::kable(avgTimePerProj)

Disonnect to Database
